#!/usr/bin/env python
import sys

if __name__ == '__main__':
    T = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
    for t in xrange(0, T):
        N, C = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().strip().split(' ')]
        A = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().strip().split(' ')]
        if sum(A) <= C:
            print "Yes"
        else:
            print "No"
